about_the_game:
Hermitage Strange Case Files -- Original Sound Tracks

This album includes every background music in the Hermitage game, plus a concept theme (#19), which are all passionately composed by RabbitJ and Haloweak from Vanguard Sound. Now it’s time to indulge in some evocative melodies.

List of Tracks is included with the purchase.

* This DLC will be stored in the Hermitage game installation folder.
